casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Kristen HORN, Petitioner No. 33 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. May 17, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 17th day of May, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the decision of the Superior Court is REVERSED, and the order of the Court of Common Pleas is REINSTATED in accordance with this Court's opinion in Commonwealth v. Perfetto, 7 EAP 2018.
